snippet: An unnamed company described in a sweeping probe of corruption in football's world governing body FIFA matches the description of a close affiliate of Grupo Televisa <TLVACPO.MX>, the largest broadcaster in Latin America, according to a Reut...
lead_paragraph: An unnamed company described in a sweeping probe of corruption in football's world governing body FIFA matches the description of a close affiliate of Grupo Televisa <TLVACPO.MX>, the largest broadcaster in Latin America, according to a Reuters review of U.S. and Swiss government documents.

headline.main: Exclusive-Televisa Affiliate Surfaces in Widening FIFA Bribery Probe
headline.print_headline: Exclusive-Televisa Affiliate Surfaces in Widening FIFA Bribery Probe
